# `stor open` for [database](/commands/categories/database.md)

<div class='command-title'>Opens the in-memory sqlite database.</div>

## Signature

```> stor open {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input   | output           |
| ------- | ---------------- |
| nothing | sqlite-in-memory |
## Examples

Open the in-memory sqlite database
```nu
> stor open

```
